AUROC=0.7894482693577289	AUPRC=0.7672084838007788	Accuracy=0.7055984555984556	MCC=0.39882821385496947	Recall=0.5639913232104121	Precision=0.7142857142857143	f1_score=0.6303030303030304

######NOTE#######
#According to help_documentation of sklearn.metrics.classification_report:in binary classification, recall of the positive class is also known as sensitivity; recall of the negative class is specificity#

              precision    recall  f1-score   support

     control       0.70      0.82      0.76       575
        case       0.71      0.56      0.63       461

   micro avg       0.71      0.71      0.71      1036
   macro avg       0.71      0.69      0.69      1036
weighted avg       0.71      0.71      0.70      1036
